div.p: Medication types that may be associated with a coded medication, these assist in determining appopriate usage of medication coding.

description.value: The Medication Type code system defines concepts in a classification scheme for medication coding. The classification scheme defines the type of information covered by the code e.g. branded product with no strength or form.
